programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: Adventure Time

Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Mordecai the blue jay and Rigby the raccoon hate having to do work as groundskeepers at the local park, trying to slack off whenever they can. When they have simple problems to solve, they often lead to a surreal, extreme, and often supernatural misadventures. Usually this makes their boss, Benson (a gumball machine) extremely angry and on the verge to fire them and annoys their coworker, Skips (a yeti, voiced by Mark Hamill). The pair are always saved by the other manager/owner Pops (a man with a lollipop-shaped head) as he enjoys their constant antics. Co-workers Muscle-Man (an overweight, green man) and Hi-Five Ghost sometimes get involved in the shenanigans, but usually find a way out and leave Mordecai and Rigby in the firing line.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin try to get a game back from Tobias but Darwin starts to feel like a sidekick to Gumball and refuses to follow his orders. / Richard overhears Gumball and Darwin making fun of him which hurts his feelings and he has to regain his reputation as a hero. / Gumball tries to look good in the school photo. / Gumball and Darwin get caught in the middle of a trash can war between Richard and Mr. Robinson. / Gumball and Darwin cheat on their maths test get detention and have to escape. / Nicole gets upset with the family at the supermarket when her kids want chocolate but she says no. / The Wattersons must survive a bizarre game of Dodj or Daar through to the end. / Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball but his promise with Banana Joe interferes.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons must survive a bizarre game of Dodj or Daar through to the end. / Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball but his promise with Banana Joe interferes. / Gumball and Darwin must apologise to everyone they know after getting a threatening message on Elmore Plus. / Gumball and Darwin try to understand Jukes urgent beatbox message. / Richard is left in charge for the day but his lack of rules attracts unwanted guests to the Watterson house. / Gumball and Darwin fail to make some instant homemade movie classics. / Gumball and Darwins reputation is challenged and they really couldnt care less... / Gumball accidentally uploads a video of himself and wants it gone. / The Watterson kids come up with a fool-proof plan.

Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Dad misses a package and is forced into an escalating feud with the delivery guy. / Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. / Gumball and Darwin have to stop Alan from becoming Class President of Elmore Junior High. Director: Mic Graves.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper delves into the days news, looking beyond the broadcast to give his take, prompting us to re-think what we hear in the headlines. Cooper has covered major, international stories like the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina on the Gulf Coast, the catastrophic BP oil spill and the 2010 earthquake in Haiti, which saw the whole world fall silent. The show has won an absolute plethora of awards over the years, including GLAAD Media and Emmy awards.

programme.title: Marketplace Africa
programme.desc: With little arable land and scarce mineral resources but beautiful beaches and waters, tourism is integral to Cape Verdes economy. While country leaders are hoping this growth will turbocharge a prosperous new chapter for the country, industry leaders are looking at ways to create infrastructure, both on the ground and online, that can ensure a sustainable industry as well. Also: since the late 1970s, Animal Care Services Konsult has been in the business of livestock. Zain Asher sits down with the companys Executive Director, Opeyemi Agbato, to talk about the companys diversification strategy and how the companys grown with the country over the last four-plus decades.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Dirty Jobs
programme.desc: Dirty Jobs is an American documentary show following Mike Rowe, as he travels around the country meeting people who do some of the most difficult, odd, dangerous and challenging jobs that exist. He joins the employees on a typical work day, trying out the jobs himself, which often ends in humorous scenes, but helps him gain respect for these hardworking people. Watch him engage in constant practical jokes with his crew members, as he works as a coal miner, a snake researcher, a truck cleaner and much more.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. It takes a lot of courage to face the problems from the past and deal with the challenging present, but this is exactly what the guys do.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How Do They Do It? Ever wondered how the stripes get into toothpaste or how contact lenses are made? How do goods get from one country to another and then into our supermarkets? What are car tires made from and exactly why are plasma TV screens flat? Eating, drinking, driving, flying. These all are activities that we carry out with barely a second thought. But have you ever wondered what exactly goes into your teabag and how it got there? How does an airport handle hundreds of thousands of items of luggage each day? And just how can a cars airbag inflate so quickly? Every day – often without even realizing it – we come into contact with technology, be it in the bathroom, in the car or on the golf course. We take a look at how things work, and focus on some of the most amazing examples of everyday objects including the worlds fastest elevator and the most expensive chocolate money can buy.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: The Pool Master
programme.desc: The Pool Master is a show presented by Anthony Archer-Wills, a top pool expert, landscape architect and artist. Team of professionals lead by him design and build amazing one-of-a-kind pools, which are in great demand among homeowners. After seeing masterpiece by Anthony, you will never agree to have a rectangle with water for swimming. Multipurpose pools for exercising and entertainment full of flowers, waterfalls, decorated with natural stone according to every taste and wallet will take your breath away.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. programme.title: Bitchin Rides
programme.desc: Bitchin Rides is a reality styled TV show hosted by Dave Kindig from the Salt Lake City, Utah-based company Kindig It Designs. Daves real passion is designing and building custom cars. We watch the process of restoring and rebuilding all types and all periods of cars. In each episode Dave and his team review a car, create a design, then the team takes it apart and rebuilds to create a one-of-a-kind gem. Things get really ugly before they get pretty. Dave has the best team of top mechanics, technicians and fabricators in the business, quality is their only focus when they create the baddest bitchin rides.

programme.title: Three Men Four Wheels
programme.desc: Follow three friends and car enthusiasts - car dealer Drew Pritchard, motoring broadcaster Andy Jaye, and racing driver Marino Franchitti, as they set out to discover the greatest racing cars ever made. In each episode, one of them chooses the car - Ferrari F40, Lotus 72, Aston Martin Ulster, Porsche 911 ST, Jaguar XJ220,... then the guys learn more about the vehicle, meet some people who love it, and drive it.

programme.title: Three Men Four Wheels
programme.desc: Follow three friends and car enthusiasts - car dealer Drew Pritchard, motoring broadcaster Andy Jaye, and racing driver Marino Franchitti, as they set out to discover the greatest racing cars ever made. In each episode, one of them chooses the car - Ferrari F40, Lotus 72, Aston Martin Ulster, Porsche 911 ST, Jaguar XJ220,... then the guys learn more about the vehicle, meet some people who love it, and drive it.

programme.title: Mighty Truckers
programme.desc: This real-life road show follows the lives of twenty truckers from four different countries - Poland, Italy, Germany and the Netherlands. These unique and diverse characters will show the viewers the world of transport, introducing them with the profession of "truck driver". Who are these men and women who ensure that we get various goods on time day and night? What makes them choose the life on the road? This show will answer these questions in an "up close and personal" portrait of trucker life.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Discovery Channel takes the ubiquitous survival show theme to the next level by stripping it to its bare essentials. Two complete strangers -- a man and a woman -- meet in a very unique way: Theyre stranded in a dangerous, desolate location, without food and water, and theyre completely naked. Each episode follows the two as they attempt to survive on their own for 21 days, with nothing but one personal item each and the knowledge that the only prize is their pride and sense of accomplishment. Because there is no other choice, the couple quickly get to know each other -- and their surroundings -- and hope that their instincts, survival skills and intestinal fortitude will serve them well.

programme.title: Fast n Loud
programme.desc: Fast N Loud is a reality styled TV show featuring Richard Rawlings and his crew from the Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage. For most people old rusty cars in garages or open spaces are nothing but junk, but not for these guys. For them it is a perfect chance to reconstruct such vehicles and make some money. The old run-down cars are restored flawlessly and are able to run steadily for the next 10 years for sure. Richard and his crew work really hard to make a name for themselves and have become a huge success thanks to their enormous talents.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: Documentary series following police officers across the USA as they put their lives on the line to enforce the law. Using real footage from the officers body cameras, we show just how deadly routine checks can be, with law enforcement officials having to think on their feet and make split-second decisions to potentially save their, or someone elses, life. From knife-wielding maniacs to brutal shootouts, the series highlights the importance of our police departments. With interviews from the officers involved adding context to the footage, Body Cam Cops gives viewers unprecedented, exclusive access to what life is truly like in the line of duty.

programme.title: Nothing To Hide
programme.desc: A look at the daily life of the Customs and Tax Service officers who use modern technologies and service dogs to catch the smuggling of contraband.

programme.title: High Speed Chase
programme.desc: In Camden, Georgia, a driver leads deputies on a 150-mph chase before a high-speed PIT brings the pursuit to a shocking, fiery end.

The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. It takes a lot of courage to face the problems from the past and deal with the challenging present, but this is exactly what the guys do.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: Documentary series following police officers across the USA as they put their lives on the line to enforce the law. Using real footage from the officers body cameras, we show just how deadly routine checks can be, with law enforcement officials having to think on their feet and make split-second decisions to potentially save their, or someone elses, life. From knife-wielding maniacs to brutal shootouts, the series highlights the importance of our police departments. With interviews from the officers involved adding context to the footage, Body Cam Cops gives viewers unprecedented, exclusive access to what life is truly like in the line of duty.

programme.title: Nothing To Hide
programme.desc: A look at the daily life of the Customs and Tax Service officers who use modern technologies and service dogs to catch the smuggling of contraband.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How Do They Do It? Ever wondered how the stripes get into toothpaste or how contact lenses are made? How do goods get from one country to another and then into our supermarkets? What are car tires made from and exactly why are plasma TV screens flat? Eating, drinking, driving, flying. These all are activities that we carry out with barely a second thought. But have you ever wondered what exactly goes into your teabag and how it got there? How does an airport handle hundreds of thousands of items of luggage each day? And just how can a cars airbag inflate so quickly? Every day – often without even realizing it – we come into contact with technology, be it in the bathroom, in the car or on the golf course. We take a look at how things work, and focus on some of the most amazing examples of everyday objects including the worlds fastest elevator and the most expensive chocolate money can buy.

programme.title: Mighty Truckers
programme.desc: This real-life road show follows the lives of twenty truckers from four different countries - Poland, Italy, Germany and the Netherlands. These unique and diverse characters will show the viewers the world of transport, introducing them with the profession of "truck driver". Who are these men and women who ensure that we get various goods on time day and night? What makes them choose the life on the road? This show will answer these questions in an "up close and personal" portrait of trucker life.

programme.title: Asphalt Cowboys
programme.desc: Always on the move, rushed by customers and clients, the dearest thousands of miles away: The Trucker everyday is a tough game. But despite time pressure, congestion and traffic controls would the "asphalt cowboys" not swap her job. Each working day is an adventure, with friendships for life for Andrew, Piet and Marten. DMAX goes with the kings of the highway on a long trip across Europe, from Rostock to Milan. Spokesman of the new documentary series is a singer and Trucker Idol Gunter Gabriel - the German "Johnny Cash".

programme.title: Asphalt Cowboys
programme.desc: Always on the move, rushed by customers and clients, the dearest thousands of miles away: The Trucker everyday is a tough game. programme.title: Overhaulin
programme.desc: Overhaulin is an American reality TV series about customizing cars. The main difference from the other shows of this type is detailed presentation of the technical process and import scene plus serious-minded approach to the car owners needs. The hosts are Chip Foose and Chris Jacobs. The concept of the series is that the car owner is absolutely unaware of whats going on. His car disappears one day and the owner is convinced that it has been stolen, misplaced or lost at a mechanics shop, or has been towed away by police. Chip Foose and a team of mechanics have a week to remake the car into a custom masterpiece. Each show ends up with the surprise reuniting of the owner and his customized baby on four wheels.

programme.title: Overhaulin

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: Mike Whiteside and Robert Kulp are the hosts of Salvage Dawgs show that is about saving beautiful old things from buildings planned to be torn down. They and their talented crew teach the viewers how to repurpose old stuff into something new and useful instead of throwing it away. So if you are remodeling your home think twice before you get rid of anything. Get creative, have some fun and learn tips and tricks to help you build your skills. Learn how to transform old chairs into a functional bench, how to repurpose an old paneled door into a shelf and enjoy fantastic vintage pieces from the past.

programme.title: Dual Survival
programme.desc: Stranded in the high altitudes of the Peruvian Andes, Grady and Josh fight altitude sickness and the accompanying hallucinations - and they must find fresh water, fast.

programme.title: Dual Survival
programme.desc: Survival experts Cody and Dave head to the Valley of the Volcanoes to take on the survival scenario: a broken-down car, in the middle of a barren land, with few survival resources.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Expedition Files
programme.desc: Josh Gates takes a closer look at the Amityville Horror, the strange fate of a Civil War submarine crew, and spontaneous human combustion.

programme.title: Expedition Files
programme.desc: A new study shows the Shroud of Turin could be real. Old ghost photos are analysed with new tools. The creator of the Georgia Guidestones is revealed.

programme.title: Mystery Of Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: Locals say that Bling Frog Ranch in Utah is a cursed land, a place that should not been interfered with, a place where strange things just seem to happen. Rumours have long circulated about a lost treasure hidden somewhere on the ranch, and that the mysterious land is trying to hold on to something. This reality series follows Duane Ollinger as he throws everything he has at finding its hidden treasures, but every time he thinks he close, another peculiar incident arises.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Discovery Channel takes the ubiquitous survival show theme to the next level by stripping it to its bare essentials. Two complete strangers -- a man and a woman -- meet in a very unique way: Theyre stranded in a dangerous, desolate location, without food and water, and theyre completely naked. Each episode follows the two as they attempt to survive on their own for 21 days, with nothing but one personal item each and the knowledge that the only prize is their pride and sense of accomplishment. Because there is no other choice, the couple quickly get to know each other -- and their surroundings -- and hope that their instincts, survival skills and intestinal fortitude will serve them well.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Discovery Channel takes the ubiquitous survival show theme to the next level by stripping it to its bare essentials. Two complete strangers -- a man and a woman -- meet in a very unique way: Theyre stranded in a dangerous, desolate location, without food and water, and theyre completely naked. Each episode follows the two as they attempt to survive on their own for 21 days, with nothing but one personal item each and the knowledge that the only prize is their pride and sense of accomplishment. Because there is no other choice, the couple quickly get to know each other -- and their surroundings -- and hope that their instincts, survival skills and intestinal fortitude will serve them well.

programme.title: Scrappers
programme.desc: Trading scrap metal is like playing the stock market. From a small collection point, scrap metal goes a long way to collect and segregate before it reaches the furnace. The steel mills order batches of appropriately selected and prepared raw materials in a specified quantity and time. To trade scrap metal, you must have the ability to do business as well as luck. This program invites you to meet people who work in scrap yards all over Poland.

programme.title: Expedition Files
programme.desc: Josh Gates takes a closer look at the Amityville Horror, the strange fate of a Civil War submarine crew, and spontaneous human combustion.

programme.title: Expedition Files
programme.desc: A new study shows the Shroud of Turin could be real. Old ghost photos are analysed with new tools. The creator of the Georgia Guidestones is revealed.

programme.title: Meet My Wild Friend
programme.desc: Gasp at animal power, gawp at childhood innocence, this is the true story of children who live as friends with wild animals. The director of The First Cry, Gilles de Maistre has traveled the world in search of children who maintain unusual and special relationships with wild animals. With the strength of innocence, the power of raw faith and the magic of respect, these little princes have found the balance between two worlds in harmony with one another, where child and animal trust each other, learn to know one another, live together and love each other. Gasp at animal power, gawp at childhood innocence, this is the true story of children who live as friends with wild animals.

programme.title: Africas Deadliest
programme.desc: A national Geographic documentary looking into the deadliest animals that roam Africa. Examining animals that have evolved complex weapons from teeth to claws and agility so that they can protect themselves and battle effectively. From elephant tusks that can defend or attack to the fur, speed and agility of seals. Showing how these animals have exceptional skills and power alongside their body features that have developed into ideal tools for their needs.

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: Wildebeest and Zebra - Africas most famous drifters. Hundreds of thousands of zebra live together in the Serengeti. Their distinctive eye-catching stripes are as unique as fingerprints and even within the largest of gatherings no two zebra will be found with exactly the same stripes. Turtles that make epic journeys to reproduce. The most abundant sea turtle in the world, Olive Ridleys have extraordinary nesting habits. These small turtles migrate massive distances between their oceanic feeding grounds and the shores that draw them back to mate, and then to nest. Sooty Tern - Sea birds that dont come to land for years. Like the turtle, once it has left land for the first time, a young Sooty Tern may not go back for years, spending all its time in the ocean skies until it is time for it to breed. Soaring on outstretched wings, these elegant seabirds feed almost entirely on the fish driven to the surface by the hunters below. Australian Pelicans - Water birds that follow ephemeral rivers. Pelicans – these quirky, comical, big billed birds are usually thought of as spending all their time around coasts and harbors. They are widespread in Australias lakes, rivers, billabongs and estuaries – or other waterway with enough food for their fish-loving lifestyle. The whales and whale sharks that roam the great oceans. Some of the greatest migratory animals on earth are those that live in its waters and traverse its great oceans. From baleen whales that travel from the nutrient rich polar waters and the whale sharks whose migrations we barely understand.

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: The targeting Archer fish. Just below the surface of the water is one of natures most precise miniature hunters – the fabulous Archer fish. Able to shoot down their prey with targeted jet propelled water darts the archer fish is bulls-eye accurate. The ambushing Portia. A mere centimeter in length, the Portia spider is one of natures most capable and intelligent hunters. A formidable serial killer of other spiders, Portias are fast to learn and quick to adapt. The harpooning cone shell. In an ocean full of fast moving and agile fish, those that hunt them need sure fire methods of capture. So it is perhaps surprising that one of their most deadly adversaries, is a very slow moving snail. Weapon swinging Bolas Spiders. As the day comes to and darkness sets in, one of the worlds most deceptive hunters begins her nightly rituals. Dangling from the silken trapeze line she has just laid the female Bolas Spider spins a short silken thread punctuated with tiny globules and ending in one huge sticky silken bolas. Slave Making Ants. Running over almost every corner of the earth are millions and millions of tiny worker ants. Yet for some ant species, most of the workers are not their own blood. These are the slave makers trap laying Ant Lions. Throughout the sandy soils that blanket the earth there are hundreds of species of ants making a living on the land they find themselves. Yet there is one insect whose larvae makes a living on them – the one and a half centimeter, cunning, powerful, ferocious and often inconspicuous Ant lion Parasitic Pompilid wasps In the dunes of the Namib Desert is a little wasp that seeks out a very certain type of prey. Pompilid wasps, also known as spider wasps are named after the food they seek, and they are extremely good at seeking it.…which is the top of the micro predators?

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Since the 1970s, sea lion populations have declined more than 80% along the North Pacific coast. Scientists at the University of British Columbia and the Vancouver Aquarium are working together to help save Canadas iconic and largest pinniped - the stellar sea lion To help understand why their numbers are dropping, researchers work with the highly intelligent mammals at a unique floating laboratory. At The Open Water Research Station, free swimming seals and sea lions are observed in their natural habitat.

programme.title: Cheetah: The Price Of Speed
programme.desc: The cheetah is a highly specialised animal. It excels at one thing alone, running down high-speed prey faster than any other mammal on earth.But this specialisation comes at a cost. The cheetah as a predatory model seems focussed on one single area of expertise. Outside of pursuing prey, how effective is this animal when compared to the other apex predators of the savannah?Alongside lions, leopards, vultures and hyenas how does the cheetah fit into the efficient cogs of the savannah system? Can it compete, or is it an outsider, cornered by its own specialisation?The primary character in the story is a cheetah mother, who goes about her daily life, hunting for her three cubs. Her trials and tribulations highlight the refined hunting system of the cheetah, but they also shed light on her weaknesses, and the lack of robustness in the species itself.

programme.title: Croc Labyrinth
programme.desc: Herpetologist Vince Shacks and underwater cameraman Brad Bestelink go on a unique crocodile diving adventure to find out more about these cave systems, and how the reptiles use them. They enter a dark underworld of mystery and danger, and they find themselves doing things that no one has ever attempted before. Apart from swimming with huge crocodiles, theyre the first to noose a wild Nile crocodile underwater, and theyre the first to attach a remote camera to it, to see where it goes.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: Built in the early 1800s, Whitby Hall used to be an administrative center and now stands as a public park and arts center. It has never before been investigated, but staff have reported many noises and presences among them.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: The county of Flintshire in Wales is said to be a land filled with ghosts and haunts. Plas Teg is said to be one of the "most haunted" houses in the area. With over 400 years of history, this place is sure to be the home of many an entity.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Marvel at the site of Americas most famous water dam. Well learn about how the Hoover Dam was built, why its necessary, and take a behind the scenes look at its inner workings.

programme.title: Journeys in India
programme.desc: Journeys in India is a ground-breaking travel series focusing on the Indian subcontinent. This first season highlights the history, culture, architecture, and wildlife of one of the most mysterious and exciting areas on earth. Perfect for the would-be or armchair traveler, this 13 part series is beautifully filmed with all original footage. Join host Bill Ball as he takes you on the adventures of a lifetime!

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Nairobi is the capital of Kenya and one of the most fascinating cities in Africa. On our visit well see the colonial architecture of a bygone era and the ultra-modern side of town as well. Well learn the truth behind the "Out of Africa" story and our host gets eye-to-eye with some endangered giraffes.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Bienvenido a Miami! We take a look at the history behind Floridas modern metropolis. We visit the Ancient Spanish Monastery, see the opulence of the Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, and head into the swamp to learn about the Miccosukee indians.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: The Saints come marching in as we tour the iconic St. Louis Cathedral and the mysterious Ursuline Convent in New Orleans. We delve into Mardi Gras history at Mardi Gras World and visit the National WWII Museums world class collection.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures

Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Travel Quest

Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The Japanese Asteroid sample return mission has reached its target and is surveying the space rock ready to dip down and take a sample. The return of asteroid material to Earth will aid scientists in the evolving asteroid planetary defense systems.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Two new space telescopes are in orbit and completing their shakedown; Gaia and TESS they too will be joined by the James Webb Telescope. Together they will be opening up a whole new vista into time and space.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Our solar system is vast, from our own star the Sun to Earth is nearly 150 million kilometers or 1 Astronomical Unit. Jupiter is 5.2 AU distant and Pluto up to 48AU, the solar system extends far beyond this into interstellar space. We humans cannot yet travel that sort of distance, however w e can and do send our robots and probes in our place; and the results are astounding.

This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Zenith - Advances In Space Exploration
programme.desc: Zenith - Advances in Space Exploration reveals these latest developments and the implications they hold for all of us.

programme.title: New Frontier

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The Latest in Martian exploration from orbit and on the ground, new sources of water and planetary dust storms are a few of the stories unfolding on to the Red Planet.

programme.title: Japanese Heights
programme.desc: There is more to Japans natural landscape than just Mount Fuji! Discover the countrys numerous mountains and the ethos of the people who live there. From mountains with eight peaks, mountain gods who keep locals in their awe to building snow monsters and embracing modern activities like skiing - this documentary shows the unseen side to Japan!

programme.title: Depleted Uranium, A Very Presentable Killer
programme.desc: More than 50 countries now possess weapons based on depleted uranium (DU). Experimentation has been rife, and the consequences for civilians and the military alike have been dramatic. This investigation compares and contrasts the arguments of those who defend and attack a technology that is highly toxic. For 20 years, scientists, doctors, veterans and activists have denounced the use of DU. Against them are the arms industry lobbyists and nuclear authorities who continue to minimise the risks. Through archive documents, interviews and in situ investigations, accompanied by key witnesses (victims, experts...) we aim to present a clearer picture of the issues and stakes linked to the use of DU. Quick-paced, with a sense of urgency, the film underlines the essential background and conflicting viewpoints, enabling viewers to make up their own minds about a subject that concerns us all.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: Carnfield Hall is a country house dating from the 15th and 16th Centuries. This private residence turn event hall is using its paranormal activity to draw in business. Are these spirits the old residents?

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: The team investigate a disused factory in Burton-Upon-Trent. Reports of paranormal happenings are common and the team are ready for anything.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: TTH heads to the great white North…kind of. We visit the world class city of Toronto. There well head straight up the Western Hemispheres tallest structure, the CN Tower. Next we score a look at the Hockey Hall of Fame and see a North American castle at Casa Loma. Finally we see how the British defended their city against the newly formed United States at Fort York.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Featured in films and documentaries, the mane-less lions of Tsavo have a fierce reputation - man-eaters. Journeys embarks on a photo hunt for these legendary beasts of the bush. In the process, we witness the raw power of the ghosts in the dark.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Gold, ivory and slaves drove the economy of the East coast of Africa 500 years ago. Join us as we explore the Portuguese and Arab roles in these horrific trade schemes. Well also investigate the pristine waters off the coast of the nearby National Park where our host dons a snorkel mask and comes face-to-face with the creatures of the coral reef.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Get your kicks on Route 66 in Flagstaff, AZ. Duck and cover! Were headed to the famous Barringer meteor crater outside of town. Then we scan the stars for heavenly bodies at Lowell Observatory. Well learn the history of the region at the Northern Arizona History Museum, and finally swing from their many ponderosa pines at Flagstaff Extreme adventure park.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Were shipping off to Belfast, Northern Ireland on todays episode. First, well gawk at the worlds biggest Titanic museum. Then, well learn about the provinces complicated history at the Ulster Museum. Finally, we get thrown in the slammer at the very creepy, Crumlin Road Jail.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: As scientists and astronomers peer closer at nearby stars with ever more fidelity they are discovering planets; exo planets, worlds outside our own solar system. With technological advances and improved techniques scientists are discovering more and more worlds every day. With confidence scientists now calculated there could be as many as 40 billion Earth like planets in our Milky Way galaxy alone.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The night sky is a time machine. The further we look out into the universe the further back in time we reach. What we see in the night sky is only a small percentage of the contents of the Universe, most is dark matter and dark energy we know it exists; however its nature eludes us for the moment.

programme.title: Stolen Treasures
programme.desc: Its the biggest museum in the world…the museum of artworks stolen over the centuries and never rediscovered. These works haunt the nightmares of their owners, and occupy the days of hundreds of police officers across the world, as well as those of a handful of private agencies; no country or museum of importance can claim to have been spared. According to Interpol, art theft is the fourth largest criminal trade, after the drug trade, the weapons trade and money laundering. How could it be otherwise, when the soaring price of art propels the value of some paintings into the tens of millions of Euros? This world appears to be full of mysteries. Crime syndicates rub shoulders with petty criminals and the police care more about recovering the items than they do about arresting the perpetrators.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: Meet My Wild Friend
programme.desc: Gasp at animal power, gawp at childhood innocence, this is the true story of children who live as friends with wild animals. The director of The First Cry, Gilles de Maistre has traveled the world in search of children who maintain unusual and special relationships with wild animals. With the strength of innocence, the power of raw faith and the magic of respect, these little princes have found the balance between two worlds in harmony with one another, where child and animal trust each other, learn to know one another, live together and love each other. Gasp at animal power, gawp at childhood innocence, this is the true story of children who live as friends with wild animals.

programme.title: Africas Deadliest
programme.desc: A national Geographic documentary looking into the deadliest animals that roam Africa. Examining animals that have evolved complex weapons from teeth to claws and agility so that they can protect themselves and battle effectively. From elephant tusks that can defend or attack to the fur, speed and agility of seals. Showing how these animals have exceptional skills and power alongside their body features that have developed into ideal tools for their needs.

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: Fanged Spiders with their scurrying bites. The Scorpion with its deadly sting... A sinister cold bloodied crocodile. The hypnotizing venomous snake. Or the King of Beasts, the Lion? Which one is the most dangerous? LION Giraffes are eternally majestic, buffalo formidable, but with their golden fur, regal mane and fearsome presence lions are known as the "King of Beasts" SCORPIONS A barely habitable burnt corner of the earth, parched and sun drenched... Once the sun has set and temperatures drop, the night time wilderness becomes a very dangerous place. SPIDERS With long legs that weave inescapable snares, spiderlings that hatch in their hundreds….and fangs that inject lethal venom into their prey, spiders strike fear into many people. In Greek mythology the great weaving god Arachne, was turned into the first spider, while in Japanese mythology shape shifting demons often take a spider-like form. SNAKES Snakes have fascinated and terrified humans for thousands of years. In many parts of the world they are worshipped as protectors and creators. But some cultures fear snakes as devils and symbols of vengeance and death. CROCODILE Lurking in the worlds rivers, marshes and swamps lie

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: Camouflaged cats. Some animals will never be inconspicuous, others blend so perfectly with their surroundings that they can move through them without detection. For many of the cats of Africa, camouflage is key to survival. From the spots of the cheetah, the rosettes of the leopard and the stripes and dots of the serval, these cats have evolved to merge with their habitat. Hidden lizards. Feeding on these harvester ants, is a beautifully adapted predator, the regal horned lizard. Merging perfectly with their surroundings these small reptiles live in the rocky, gravelly, desert like habitats of Arizona where they make a living almost exclusively on ants. Cryptic snakes. In the leaf litter of Australias woodlands and scrub hides one of its most cryptic and dangerous snakes – the death adder. The camouflaging patterns of snakes are mesmerizing – from the pearly multicolored sheen of the carpet python to the mottled bands of the death adder, snakes can be hidden right before our eyes. Shimmering cuttlefish . Many animals can hide and many can disguise themselves to some degree, but few can rival the camouflaging capabilities of the magnificent cuttlefish. Cuttlefish can not only change color, they can also change their shape as well as their texture as they morph through seamless variations of themselves.…. and concealed chameleons. Making camouflage an art form are the verdant sauntering highly distinctive chameleons that make their homes in rain forests, grasses, trees and bushes. There are well over 100 species of chameleon around today, ranging from the tiny pygmy chameleon to the prehistoric looking horned chameleon, most are found in Africa and Madagascar. Birds. In the frozen climbs of the northern hemisphere winter, ptarmigans blend against their snowy surroundings. Invisible spiders - Crab Spider. There is one tiny creature that has evolved a camouflage that is so perfect in its simplicity it is often overlooked by the casual human observer. Adapted to their hunting terrain the crab spiders that are found on bark and leaves are darker in coloration than those found on flowers which is the master of disguise?

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Around the globe, thousands of decommissioned naval vessels rot in dockyards. What can you do with these toxic time bombs? One solution is to clean them well, blow them up and sink them! Providing shelter and breeding grounds, countless fish and invertebrates colonize steel hulls. In the Cayman Islands, the USS Kittiwake met a watery grave and quickly transformed into a vibrant artificial reef. In the Florida Keys, dozens of purposely sunk ships are a beacon to marine life, and to scuba divers. It seems like a win-win-win situation - for the environment, for divers and for cash strapped governments. But supporters face tough opposition on many fronts. After years of struggle, Canadas newest artificial reef project - the HMCS Annapolis, is nearing completion. But will protesters get their way and scuttle the sinking?

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Theres no doubt sharks have an image problem. And theyre certainly in trouble globally. The population of some species has declined by more than 90% due to over fishing. But theres still one place in the world where sharks thrive - the Bahamas. Sharks not only prosper there, they are highly protected. Its illegal to kill them. Stuart Coves passion is sharks. Travelling In his private plane, he spreads the gospel of shark advocacy across the Bahamian island chain. And shark tourism is his livelihood. A successful entrepreneur, his main business revolves around scuba diving with sharks. Cove also works with Bahamian and international researchers in their studies of dangerous species such as tiger, hammerhead and bull sharks.

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: Wildebeest and Zebra - Africas most famous drifters. Hundreds of thousands of zebra live together in the Serengeti. Their distinctive eye-catching stripes are as unique as fingerprints and even within the largest of gatherings no two zebra will be found with exactly the same stripes. Turtles that make epic journeys to reproduce. The most abundant sea turtle in the world, Olive Ridleys have extraordinary nesting habits. These small turtles migrate massive distances between their oceanic feeding grounds and the shores that draw them back to mate, and then to nest. Sooty Tern - Sea birds that dont come to land for years. Like the turtle, once it has left land for the first time, a young Sooty Tern may not go back for years, spending all its time in the ocean skies until it is time for it to breed. Soaring on outstretched wings, these elegant seabirds feed almost entirely on the fish driven to the surface by the hunters below. Australian Pelicans - Water birds that follow ephemeral rivers. Pelicans – these quirky, comical, big billed birds are usually thought of as spending all their time around coasts and harbors. They are widespread in Australias lakes, rivers, billabongs and estuaries – or other waterway with enough food for their fish-loving lifestyle. The whales and whale sharks that roam the great oceans. Some of the greatest migratory animals on earth are those that live in its waters and traverse its great oceans. From baleen whales that travel from the nutrient rich polar waters and the whale sharks whose migrations we barely understand.

programme.title: Cheetah: The Price Of Speed
programme.desc: The cheetah is a highly specialised animal. It excels at one thing alone, running down high-speed prey faster than any other mammal on earth.But this specialisation comes at a cost. The cheetah as a predatory model seems focussed on one single area of expertise. Outside of pursuing prey, how effective is this animal when compared to the other apex predators of the savannah?Alongside lions, leopards, vultures and hyenas how does the cheetah fit into the efficient cogs of the savannah system? Can it compete, or is it an outsider, cornered by its own specialisation?The primary character in the story is a cheetah mother, who goes about her daily life, hunting for her three cubs. Her trials and tribulations highlight the refined hunting system of the cheetah, but they also shed light on her weaknesses, and the lack of robustness in the species itself.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: 9 gadus vecā Stefānija Kreina ceļā uz mājām pēkšņi pazūd. Pirmie meklējumi ir bez rezultātiem. Četru gadu garumā likumsargiem neizdodas nedz ivņu atrast, nedz uziet kādu pavedienu. Nu tiek cerēts, ka jaunākās testēšanas metodes ļaus atklāt šo mistēriju.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Izmeklētāju komandai jāidentificē un jāarestē izvarotājs, balstotie uz informāciju, ko sniedzis upuris un digitālajiem pierādījumiem, kas uzieti nozieguma vietā.

programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Pēc 40 gadiem sieviete ir sajūsmā beidzot atkal satikt savu atsvešināto māsu, bet tad tiek ierauta draudīgā slepkavības plānā.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Skaistā topošā kosmetoloģe Šenona Greivsa atrasta sakropļota saldētavā ar piekaramo atslēgu. Kad cita sieviete tiek pamanīta piebraucam un ieejam viņas dzīvoklī, detektīvi atklāj šausminošu slēpšanu.

programme.title: Mensons: Pazudušie ieraksti
programme.desc: Kā viens cilvēks var skalot smadzenes vidusšķiras hipiju mīlošu bērnu grupai un ieprogrammēt viņus slepkavībām? Ar nekad iepriekš neredzētiem kadriem šajā filmā tiek stāstīts par Čārlza Mensona kultu un dažām no Amerikas šausminošākajām slepkavībām.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Topošo aktrisi Vikiju Morganu viņas istabas biedrs nogalina ar beisbola nūju. Kad viņš atzīstas policistiem, šķiet, ka lieta ir atklāta un slēgta. Lietas ātri pagriežas, liekot visiem sākt debates, kurš tad īsti nogalināja Vikiju Morganu?

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: Pazudis transpersona Seidžs Smits no Šarlotsvillas. Policija identificējusi aizdomās turamo, tomēr izmeklēšana iegūst jaunu pavērsienu, kas liek ciešāk izzināt Seidža tuvāko draugu loku un meklēt atbildes tajā.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Izsmalcinātu dārglietu zagļi Birmingemas juvilierizstrādājumu veikalā nozog 300 000 mārciņu vērtu zeltu un aizbēg mazāk nekā 60 sekundēs. Policijai jāmeklē pierādījumi un pavedieni, lai atgūtu nozagto.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Jaunas sievietes dzīvību apdraud viņas bijušais vīrs. Viņu attiecības kļūst nāvējošas. Ar policista apņēmību un negaidītu informatoru palīdzību atklājas nežēlīgs slepkavības plāns, ko var apturēt tikai slepena operācija.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Veiksmīgā ārste un divu bērnu māte Terēza Sīversa atrasta līdz nāvei piekauta savā virtuvē pēc atgriešanās mājās no ģimenes atvaļinājuma. Kriminālistikas analīze un novērošanas kameru video aizved izmeklētājus pie šokējošiem pierādījumiem.

programme.title: Kenedija nogalināšana
programme.desc: Tas bija noziegums, kas satrieca un mainīja ASV. Šis aizraujošais dokumentālais stāsts, kas aplūko liktenīgos 1963. gada 22. novembra notikumus, kad tika noslepkavots prezidents Džons F. Kenedijs. Dokumentālais darbs no trim dažādiem skatpunktiem pēta prezidenta drošības vadītāja Roja Kellermena, slepkavas Lī Hārvija Osvalda un pirmās lēdijas Džekijas Kenedijas darbības pirms apšaudes.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Kad pazūd kāda bagāta sabiedriska sieviete, policija spriež vai aiz viņas pazušanas nav divi no visvairāk meklētajiem krāpniekiem. Vai viņu alkatība kļuva nāvējoša?

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: Pazudis transpersona Seidžs Smits no Šarlotsvillas. Policija identificējusi aizdomās turamo, tomēr izmeklēšana iegūst jaunu pavērsienu, kas liek ciešāk izzināt Seidža tuvāko draugu loku un meklēt atbildes tajā.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Izsmalcinātu dārglietu zagļi Birmingemas juvilierizstrādājumu veikalā nozog 300 000 mārciņu vērtu zeltu un aizbēg mazāk nekā 60 sekundēs. Policijai jāmeklē pierādījumi un pavedieni, lai atgūtu nozagto.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Neredzamie briesmoņi: Sērijveida slepkavas Amerikā
programme.desc: Astoņdesmito gadu vidū divi no "Piecinieka" - Geisijs un Bandijs - sēž uz nāvessoda izpildes soliņa. Viņu slepkavnieciskās darbības beidzot ir ierobežotas. Tikmēr Grīnriveras slepkava ir prasījis 41 dzīvību, un, tā kā nav neviena aizdomās turamā, lietas darba grupa pieņem palīdzību no negaidīta avota - Teda Bandija. BTK nogalina savu kaimiņu. Desmit gadus pēc savas pirmās slepkavības Dāmers padodas savām fantāzijām un izdara līdz šim nežēlīgākos noziegumus.

programme.title: Neredzamie briesmoņi: Sērijveida slepkavas Amerikā
programme.desc: Pēc gadiem ilgas sabiedrības bailēm no "Piecinieka" rokām, atlikušie trīs slepkavas tiek notverti laikā no 1991. līdz 2005. gadam. Ironiskā pavērsienā, ideālā kultūras, mediju, likumsargu un tehnoloģiju vētra, ko šie vīrieši bija izmantojuši, lai izvairītos no notveršanas, ir attīstījusies, galu galā apzīmogojot viņu likteņus un izbeidzot viņu terora valdīšanu.

programme.title: Mensons: Pazudušie ieraksti
programme.desc: Kā viens cilvēks var skalot smadzenes vidusšķiras hipiju mīlošu bērnu grupai un ieprogrammēt viņus slepkavībām? Ar nekad iepriekš neredzētiem kadriem šajā filmā tiek stāstīts par Čārlza Mensona kultu un dažām no Amerikas šausminošākajām slepkavībām.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Gubernatora palīdze pazūd bez vēsts. Viņas pazušana liek uzsākt izmeklēšanu, atklājot viena no štata ietekmīgākajiem cilvēkiem tumšos noslēpumus.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Ņujorkā pazūd jauna sieviete, un viņas ģimene ir pārliecināta, ka viņa ir noslepkavota. Kā noķert nenotveramu slepkavu, ja nevar pierādīt noziegumu? Izmeklētāji ir apņēmības pilni noskaidrot, kas īsti noticis.

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: Ešlija Samersa ir jautra 14 gadus veca meitene. Kad viņa 4. jūlijā pazūd, viņas ģimene ir šokā. Mistērija kļūst plašāka - FIB viņas pazušanu saista ar vidām citām pazudušām sievietēm no apkārtnes. Desmit gadus vēlāk joprojām trūkst atbildes.

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: Pazudis Lodans Šīndelmans, un likumsargi atrod pamestu viņa auto. Dažādi avoti vēsta, ka redzējuši Loganu, bet meklēšana nedod rezultātus. Trūkstot pierādījumiem par apzinātu bēgšanu, policija ir spiesta pārbaudīt viņa ģimenes pretrunīgo pagātni.

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: Karību jūras kruīzā 23 gadus vecā Eimija Bredlija pazūd no savas kajītes un vairs netiek redzēta. Pēc desmitgadēm ilgām ciešanām viņas ģimene turpina meklējumus - viņi saka, ka atradīs savu mīļoto Eimiju.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Sieviete ar mācīšanās grūtībām apsūdz strādnieku par nepiedienīgu izrādīšanos viņas dzīvoklī.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Kādam cilvēkam uzbrukts un pēc šī uzbrukuma upuris ir komā. Policija mēģina izmantot DNS, lai apkopotu notikušo.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Čārlzs Mensons satiek pasauli, un mediji nespēj vien beigt tiražēt hipiju slepkavu kultu, ar ko noslēdzas 60. gadi. Kāpēc piecdesmit gadus vēlāk viņš joprojām piesaista mūsu uzmanību?

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Pēc rūgtas šķiršanās atkarību terapeite piespiež savu pacientu palīdzēt atrast slepkavu, kas nogalinātu viņas bijušo vīru. Viņa gan nezina, ka paciente lūdz slepena policista palīdzību, lai mēģinātu novērst aukstasinīgu slepkavību.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Policija nosūta slepenu informatoru ar uzdevumu noskaidrot, vai viņu draugs un ārsts vēlas nogalināt savu atsvešināto sievu. Vai varbūt tas ir tikai viņa greizsirdīgās draudzenes plāns?

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Tetovēšanas salona īpašnieks Deniss Ābrahamsens atrasts brutāli noslepkavots, kails uz masāžas galda savās mājās. Pierādījumi liecina par traku seksa ballīti, kas ar slavenu pieaugušo aktrisi beigusies nelāgi.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Skaista divu bērnu māte Kristāla Makdauela pazuda viesuļvētras Hārvija laikā, kas plosās Hjūstonā. Novērošanas kameru video aizved izmeklētājus pie viņas slepkavas.

programme.desc: Astoņdesmito gadu vidū divi no "Piecinieka" - Geisijs un Bandijs - sēž uz nāvessoda izpildes soliņa. Viņu slepkavnieciskās darbības beidzot ir ierobežotas. programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Nekas nevar izvest Erlu no komas, tāpēc Rendijs vēršas pie dziednieka no viņu pagātnes. Puisis gan stāsta, ka vairs neārstē cilvēkus, jo atklājis, kā Erls dzīvoja savu dzīvi pēc tam, kad pirmo reizi viņu "dziedināja".

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Rendijs atklājis, ka lietu izsvītrošana no Erla saraksta uzlabo viņa stāvokli, bet pirmais, ko viņš izvēlas - atdodot zagtu motociklu - atgriež biedējošas atmiņu no Rendija un Erla pagātnes, ko Rendijs bija aizmirsis.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikla meklējumi pēc noslēpumainās "N. Blūtas" aizved viņu pie Nellijas, prostitūtas, kuru viņš uzskata par savu pazudušo māsu, un kura, iespējams, var visu izskaidrot. Tikmēr Bastera viltus koma izraisa ārstu sašutumu.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Džobs piedalās USO programmā un dodas uz Irāku, taču drīz vien viņu aiztur ASV bruņotie spēki. Prokurori uzskata, ka viņa rīcība ir nodevība, tāpēc Maikls un Basters dodas uz Irāku, lai atbrīvotu Džobu. Tur viņi apmeklē pašu uzņēmuma celto māju un atklāj, kas tajā slēpjas.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Nekas nevar izvest Erlu no komas, tāpēc Rendijs vēršas pie dziednieka no viņu pagātnes. Puisis gan stāsta, ka vairs neārstē cilvēkus, jo atklājis, kā Erls dzīvoja savu dzīvi pēc tam, kad pirmo reizi viņu "dziedināja".

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Rendijs atklājis, ka lietu izsvītrošana no Erla saraksta uzlabo viņa stāvokli, bet pirmais, ko viņš izvēlas - atdodot zagtu motociklu - atgriež biedējošas atmiņu no Rendija un Erla pagātnes, ko Rendijs bija aizmirsis.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Ofisā, kura darbinieki nodarbojas ar papīra pārdošanu un piegādi, viss ir tāpat kā lielākajā daļā pasaules ofisu - tajā ir boss, tajā ir dažādi darbinieki, no kuriem dažs labs vien darbu tikai imitē, un starp visiem izveidojušās ofisa attiecības tādā kā piespiedu kārtā - labākas un arī ne tik labas. Kā jau ar kolēģiem. Ofisa vadītājs Maikls, kuru attēlo slavenais aktieris un komiķis Stīvs Karels, savus darbiniekus ik dienas cenšas iesaistīt savos izgudrotajos jokos un uzdevumos. Viņš pats domā, ka ir pasaules labākais boss, ko apliecina krūzīte ar uzrakstu - "Pasaules labākais boss". Diemžēl šo krūzīti viņš sev nopircis pats. Maikls cenšas būt draudzīgs pret saviem darbiniekiem, tomēr lielākā daļa viņa joku ir rasistiski, šovinistiski vai citādi aizskaroši.
