programme.title: Doctors
programme.desc: War is not just a line of fire, but a continuous battle for every heartbeat. Documentary project "Doctors" tells the story of those who changed sterile operating rooms to smoky trenches, and white coats to military pixels. This is a story about titanic medics who, under fire, snatch their comrades from the hands of death. You will see the true value of every second, where professionalism borders on superhuman courage, and saving lives becomes the highest form of victory.

programme.title: Didi
programme.desc: 2008. gadā, pēdējā vasaras mēnesī pirms vidusskolas sākuma, 13 gadus vecs zēns iemācās to, ko viņa ģimene nevar viņam iemācīt: kā slidot, kā flirtēt un kā mīlēt savu mammu.

programme.title: Barijs Sīls: Īstens amerikānis
programme.desc: Stāsts par Bariju Sīlu, amerikāņu lidmašīnas pilotu, kurš iefiltrējās narkotiku kartelī CIP slepena uzdevuma ietvaros 20. gs. 80. gados, kas tiek atmaskots kā pret Irānu vērsta militāra operācija.

programme.title: Nabaga radības
programme.desc: Sava nežēlīgā vīra ietekmē Bella (Emma Stouna) ir izdarījusi pašnāvību, taču ekscentrisks zinātnieks (Vilems Defo) nolemj izglābt sievieti un pārstāda viņai pašas vēl nedzimušā bērna smadzenes. Viņa aizbildniecībā Bella alkst mācīties un iepazīt dzīvi, kas Viktorijas laikmeta stingrajā sabiedrībā viņai līdz šim bijusi liegta. Kopā ar viltīgo un valdzinoši cinisko juristu Dankanu Vederbērnu viņa dodas ceļojumā pāri kontinentiem. Ceļojuma laikā Bella arvien vairāk atbrīvojas no sava laikmeta aizspriedumiem un sabiedrības ierobežojumiem.

programme.title: Slepkavas kodekss
programme.desc: Kad Anna bija bērns, viņu no nāves izglāba leģendārais slepkava Mūdijs. Apguvusi sava glābēja arodu, Anna ir kļuvusi par vienu no prasmīgākajām pasūtījuma slepkavām pasaulē. Kad Mūdijs tiek nogalināts, viņa nozvēras atriebties un nogalināt to, kurš atņēmis dzīvību cilvēkam, kurš viņai iemācījis visu.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Superļaundaris Gru ir izmests no darba, jo neapturēja jaunāko cilvēces apdraudētāju. Viņš zaudē dzīvesprieku, bet to atgūst, kad uzzina, ka viņa neredzētais dvīņubrālis Dru vēlas viņu satikt. Gru ar ģimeni dodas uz brāļa grezno dzīvesvietu. Brāļi kopā uzsāks cīņu pret Baltazaru Bretu, kurš bērnībā bija slavenība, taču tagad kļuvis par superļaundari, kurš terorizē pasauli. Minioni uzsāk protesta streiku pret to, ka Gru vispār neinteresē iespēja valdīt pār pasauli.

programme.title: 10 dzīvības
programme.desc: Lutināts kaķis Bekets par pašsaprotamu uzskata laimīgo lozi, kas viņam iedalīta, kopš viņu izglāba un iemīlēja Roza, labsirdīga un aizrautīga studente. Kad kaķis zaudē savu devīto dzīvību, liktenis iejaucas, lai viņu aizvestu pārmācošā piedzīvojumā.

programme.title: Kā Grinčs nozaga Ziemassvētkus
programme.desc: Vūvila ir maza, brīnumaina pilsētiņa, kas atrodas sniegpārsliņā. Visiem Vūvivas iedzīvotājiem ļoti patīk Ziemassvētki. Taču pilsētiņas tuvumā mīt Grinčs – ļoti nejauks radījums, kuram riebjas gan Ziemassvētki, gan arī vūvilieši, jo tie savulaik viņu izstūmuši no sava vidus. Redzot, kā viņi priecājas un gaida svētkus, Grinčs nolemj nozagt visas Ziemassvētku dāvanas. Bet varbūt kādai mazai meitenītei izdosies sadraudzēties ar Grinču un likt viņam mainīt savus plānus?

programme.title: Minioni
programme.desc: Minjoni, kas attīstījās no dzelteniem vienšūnas organismiem, dzīvo uz Zemes kopš aizvēsturiskiem laikiem. Viņu dzīves jēga ir kalpošana, taču mazie radījumi nemitīgi atrod sev nekam nederīgus saimniekus, sākot no dinozaura un beidzot ar Napoleonu. Ja minjoniem nav saimnieka, kuram zemoties, viņi ieslīgst dziļā depresijā. Taču minjonam Kevinam ir plāns – kopā ar draugiem Stjuartu un Bobu viņš dodas meklēt jaunu ļauno saimnieku, kuram sekot. Tā viņi atrod Skārletu Nomušītu, kas ir pasaulē pirmā superļaundare.

programme.title: Konklāvs
programme.desc: Pēc pāvesta negaidītās nāves katoļu kardinālu kolēģija sapulcējas Vatikānā uz vēlēšanām, lai izvēlētos jauno pāvestu un iezīmētu jauno baznīcas laikmetu. Aiz Siksta kapelas slēgtajām durvīm kardināli no visas pasaules sacenšas par šo godu rūpīgi sargātā rituālā, kas sakņojas gadsimtiem tālā pagātnē. Kardinālam Lorensam (Reifs Fainss), kardinālu kolēģijas dekānam, ir svētais pienākums pārraudzīt šo konklāvu.

programme.title: Ugunīgi ass
programme.desc: Iedvesmojošs stāsts par Ričardu Montanezu, uzkodu ražotāja "Frito Lay" apkopēju, kurš, pateicoties savai meksikāņu izcelsmei, palīdzēja sapurināt pārtikas industriju, palīdzot radīt vienus no visu laiku populārākajiem čipsiem "Flamin Hot Cheetos".

programme.title: Kina un Juks: Polārlapsu piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Divu lapsu piedzīvojums laikā, kad tās gatavojas pirmo reizi kļūt par vecākiem un globālā sasilšana maina likumus visiem – gan dabai, gan dzīvniekiem,

programme.title: Madagaskara
programme.desc: Lauva Alekss ir Ņujorkas Centrālparka zoodārza karalis. Arī viņa labākie draugi zebra Mārtijs, žirafe Melmens un nīlzirgu meitene Glorija visu dzīvi šajā idilliskajā nebrīvē saņēmuši zoodārza apmeklētāju apbrīnu. Taču Mārtijs klusībā kaļ plānus par bēgšanu, un ar dažu apbrīnojami uzņēmīgu pingvīnu palīdzību viņam izdodas izrauties pasaulē, ko viņš sen sapņojis iepazīt. Alekss, Melmens un Glorija viņam seko, taču tiek notverti un nosūtīti uz Āfriku. Kad pingvīni sabotē kuģa komandu, Alekss, Mārtijs, Melmens un Glorija attopas izskaloti eksotiskās Madagaskaras krastā. Nu četriem ņujorkiešiem nākas izdzīvot savvaļā, un tas ir sasodīti grūti.

programme.title: Madagaskara
programme.desc: Iemīļotie animācijas filmas "Madagaskara" varoņi ir atgriezušies! Pingvīni, liekot lietā teju vai militāru precizitāti un visus iespējamos līdzekļus, ir saremontējuši vecu, reiz avarējušu lidmašīnu. Iecerēts, ka tieši tajā pazīstamie Madagaskaras varoņi dosies atpakaļ uz mājām - uz Ņujorku. Plāns ir labs, taču drīz vien Alekss, Mārtijs, Melmans, Glorija un pingvīnu komanda strauji piezemējas mežonīgajos Āfrikas plašumos, kur zoodārzā augusī četrotne pirmoreiz satiek savus sugas brāļus. Kāds no viņiem šeit atradīs savus radus, citam būs romantiski piedzīvojumi, bet nav gan zināms, vai Āfrika būs labāka par viņu mājām Centrālparka zoodārzā...

programme.title: Palaidnīgā feja
programme.desc: 337 gadus jaunajai zobu fejai Violetai maģija nešķiet īpaši aizraujoša, tāpēc viņa vienīgā nespēj nokārtot eksāmenu, lai iegūtu kristālu, kas fejām ļauj iekļūt cilvēku pasaulē. Violeta neļauj skumjām vaļu, nozog kristālu citai fejai un nokļūst 12 gadus vecās bārenītes Maksijas istabā. Tomēr, ak vai! Kristāls saplīst, un nu Violeta ir iesprostota cilvēku pasaulē! Kopā ar Maksiju viņa meklē atpakaļceļu un atklāj savu patieso aicinājumu.

programme.title: Bīstamās līgavas māsas
programme.desc: Kad naudaskāri bandīti grib sagrābt greznu kāzu viesus par ķīlniekiem, viņi vēl nezina, ka līgavas māsa ir slepenā aģente, kura ir gatava uz visu, ja kāds mēģinās izjaukt viņas labākās draudzenes kāzas.

programme.title: Krauklis
programme.desc: Dvēseles radinieki Ēriks Dravens un Šellija Vēbstere tiek nežēlīgi nogalināti. Saņemot iespēju upurēt sevi un glābt savu mūža mīlestību, Ēriks dodas ceļā, šķērsojot dzīvo un mirušo pasauli, lai atriebtos un izcīnītu taisnību.

programme.title: Mēs visi svešinieki
programme.desc: Šajā aizkustinošajā, provokatīvajā stāstā par mīlestību, ģimeni un pagātnes rēgiem Ādams dzīvo vientuļu dzīvi, taču kādu vakaru viņu apciemo noslēpumains kaimiņš, kurš uzjundī sen apspiestas jūtas un atmiņas. Abu starpā rodas saikne un nenoliedzamas simpātijas, un Ādams nonāk savā bērnības mājā, kurā 30 gadus pēc nāves šķietami dzīvo viņa vecāki.

programme.title: Advokāts
programme.desc: Veiksmīgais advokāts ir sasniedzis savas karjeras augstāko punktu un atradis liktenīgo sievieti, ar kuru vēlas drīz precēties. Viņa mierīgo dzīvi iztraucē senas paziņas lūgums. Piekrītot šim piedāvājumam, advokātam nāksies pieņemt lēmumus, kas neatbilst viņa principiem un morāles normām. Viņš vēl nemaz nenojauš, ka, iesaistoties amorālajā narkobiznesā, viņa dzīve izmainīsies līdz nepazīšanai. Filmā piedalās krāšņs aktieru ansamblis - Maikls Fasbenders, Penelope Krusa, Kemerone Diasa, Havjers Bardems un Breds Pits.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets
programme.desc: Dienā, kad zobenzobu vāveri vajā neveiksmes un viņa gandrīz pazaudē savu lielāko dārgumu ozolzīli, visi dzīvnieki dodas ceļā uz dienvidiem, meklējot glābiņu no aukstuma, kas piemeklējis zemi. Sliņķis Sids un mamuts Manfreds par ceļabiedriem kļūst nejauši. Pēc zobenzobu tīģeru uzbrukuma cilvēku apmetnei viņi izglābj mazuli. Par to rūpes uzņemas citkārt slinkais Sids un, kaut gan diezgan negribīgi, arī Manfreds. Nospriežot, ka bērna tētis ir dzīvs, viņi dodas to meklēt. Drīz ceļiniekiem pievienojas arī zobenzobu tīģeris Djego, kura uzdevums ir mazuli nolaupīt. Tā sākas draugu aizraujošais ceļojums, kura laikā visnepiemērotākajos brīžos pie apvāršņa parādās zobenzobu vāvere Skrets, izmisīgi cenzdamies glābt savu ozolzīli.

programme.title: Rūķi
programme.desc: Hloja un viņas mamma pārvācas – jau ATKAL! Turklāt viņas pārvācas uz necilu, vecu māju, kas pilna ar dārza rūķiem. Drīz Hloja gan atklāj, ka šī māja slēpj biedējošu noslēpumu. Kādu dienu pēc skolas Hloja kopā ar kaimiņu Liamu atklāj, ka rūķi patiesībā ir dzīvi! Kā izrādās, jau gadiem rūķi ir sargājuši planētu no draudīgiem maziem monstriem, kuri iebrukuši mājā caur portālu, kas ved uz citu pasauli. Kad vienīgais līdzeklis, kas varētu palīdzēt uzveikt monstrus, skolā nonāk nepareizajās rokās, Hlojai un Liamam jāsadarbojas ar rūķiem, lai cīnītos pret mazo negantnieku iebrukumu un glābtu pasauli!

programme.title: Karalisks piedāvājums
programme.desc: 2010. gadā pirms Arābu pavasara izmisušam amerikāņu tirgonim Alanam (Toms Henks) pēc mājas zaudēšanas un šķiršanās no sievas dzīvē ir iestājusies krīze. Izmisīgi cenšoties atgūt atpakaļ savu sievu, viņš dodas uz Saūda Arābiju, lai valdībai pārdotu hologrāfisku telekonferences sistēmu. Cieši apņēmies noslēgt līgumu un nepalikt uz sēkļa brūkošā ekonomikā, viņš mācās, kā izturēties svešā kultūrā ar taksometra vadītāja (Aleksandrs Bleks) un vietējā ārsta palīdzību (Sarita Čodrija)

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 2: Atkusnis
programme.desc: Laika ziņas: Tuvākās piecas dienas ir gaidāmi lieli plūdi, kam sekos pasaules gals. Iespējams, nedēļas beigās varētu izlauzties kāds saules stariņš… Mamutam Manijam, sliņķim Sidam, zobenzobu tīģerim Djego, zobenzobu vāverei Skratam un pārējiem Ledus laikmeta iemītniekiem ir sajūta, ka viņu kūstošā pasaule sāk palikt pārāk slapja un ledus kalns, kas apdraud ieleju, tūlīt lūzīs. Taču tā nav vienīgā problēma – Manijs vairs nevēlas būt viens pats, taču ir pamatotas aizdomas, ka viņš ir pēdējais mamuts. Atkal ir jādodas ceļā, kur tiek satikta valdzinoša mamutiene (iespējams, pēdējā visā pasaulē) Elija, kuru pavada uzņēmīgs oposumu pārītis Krešs un Edijs.

programme.title: Džeisons Borns
programme.desc: Bijusī CIP slepenā aģente Nikija Pārsone (Džūlija Stailza) reiz palīdzēja Bornam (Mets Deimons), pēc tam nozuda un šobrīd strādā kopā ar ziņotāju, kurš gatavojas nodot atklātībā CIP slepenās specoperācijas. Nikija ielaužas CIP sistēmā un lejupielādē visu, kas saistīts ar specoperācijām, tostarp operāciju "Dzirnakmens", kurā piedalījās Borns. CIP aģente Hetera Lī (Alīsija Vikandere) atklāj ielaušanos un par to ziņo CIP direktoram Robertam Dūvijam (Tomijs Lī Džonss), kurš ir specoperāciju galvenais vadītājs.

programme.title: Kungfu panda
programme.desc: Panda, vārdā Po, strādā nūdeļu restorānā. Viņš sapņo kļūt par slavenu kungfu meistaru, jo ir kaislīgs kungfu fans, taču Po ķermeņa apmēri īsti neatbilst šim sapnim. Un ja tā pavisam godīgi, – pandas ir slinkākie dzīvnieki visā Ķīnā. Tomēr, kad pilsētai tuvojas ienaidnieks, visu cerības balstās senā pareģojumā par kādu Po, kurš izrādīsies "izredzētais" un visus izglābs. Austrumu cīņu meistariem nāksies bruņoties ar milzu pacietību, lai slinkuma maisu Po padarītu par kungfu cīkstoni.

programme.title: Kungfu panda
programme.desc: Pandumānija turpinās! Kļuvis par varoni, panda Po nu kopā ar saviem draugiem Tīģerieni, Dzērvi, Čūsku, Pērtiķi un Dievlūdzēju aizsargā dzimto ieleju un tās iemītniekus. Taču Po mierīgajai dzīvei tiek pielikts punkts brīdī, kad uzrodas ļaundaris, kurš, liekot lietā noslēpumainu spēku, grib pakļaut Ķīnu. Pandai kopā ar draugiem būs jādodas cauri visai Ķīnai, lai uzveiktu pretinieku.

programme.title: Kungfu Panda
programme.desc: Po (Džeks Bleks) satiek savu sen pazudušo tēvu Lī (Braiens Kranstons), un abi dodas uz rezervātu, kurā sastop dažus smieklīgus ekscentriķus. Tomēr, kad uzrodas noslēpumainais ļaundaris Kajs (Džeikejs Simonss) - ļauns bullis, kurš zog kung fu meistaru dzīvības spēku - Po ir jāapmāca savi neveiklie sugas brāļi kung fu kaujas mākslā.

programme.title: Maja Ma
programme.desc: Pallavi Patela ir indiešu vidusmēra ģimenes sieva, pazīstama ar savu dejotprasmi un kulinārijas mākslu. Dēla Teja saderināšanās vakars draud izgāzties, jo paklīdušas tenkas par priekšzīmīgo mājsaimnieci Pallavi.

programme.title: Kritiķis
programme.desc: Sers Ians Makellens (Gredzenu Pavēlnieks) atveido ietekmīgu Londonas teātra kritiķi, kurš atriebības vārdā sapin šantāžas tīklus ar letālām sekām.

programme.title: Aptiekārs Melhiors. Spoks
programme.desc: Viduslaiku trilleru otrajā filmā nakts sardzi pārbaida briesmīgs spoks – traģiski noslīkusī bagāta tirgotāja meita. No rīta sargs ir miris, nokritis no augsta torņa, un vēl vairāki cilvēki zaudē dzīvību aizdomīgos negadījumos. Izmeklējot notikumus, Melhiora ceļi krustojas ar prostitūtu, priesteri, ārzemju mākslinieku un traku ķeceri. Pēdas ved uz Piritas klosteri, kura drūmās velves glabā aizmirstībā apraktu, bīstamu noslēpumu. Tajā pašā laikā Melhioru moka jautājums – kāpēc viņa mīļotā Keterlīna pēkšņi pārtrauc viņu saderināšanos?

programme.title: Kliko kundze
programme.desc: Pēc vīra pāragrās nāves Barba Nikola Ponsardēna Kliko pretstatā pieņemtajām normām pārņem jaunā vīndarīšanas uzņēmuma grožus, ko abi ar vīru bija veidojuši. Vadot uzņēmumu cauri politiskām un finanšu grūtībām, viņa ignorē kritiķus un rada revolūciju šampanieša industrijā, kļūstot par vienu no pasaules pirmajām, dižajām darījumu sievietēm. Filmas pamatā ir Tilaras Dž. Maceo "The New York Times" bestsellers "Atraitne Kliko".

programme.title: Pagraba durvis
programme.desc: Meklējot jaunu dzīves sākumu pēc spontānā aborta, pāris saņem dāvanā savu sapņu māju ar vienu nosacījumu – viņi nekad nedrīkst atvērt pagraba durvis. Vai viņi var dzīvot, nezinot, kas tur ir? Šī iekšā cīņa ar neziņu izraisa šokējošas sekas.

programme.title: Zirnekļtīkls
programme.desc: Astoņus gadus vecais Pīters ik vakaru savas istabas sienās dzird dīvainu klauvēšanu. Viņa vecāki Kerola un Marks apgalvo, ka pie vainas Pītera spilgtā iztēle, taču zēns ir pārliecināts: šajā mājā kaut kas nav kārtībā. Un pamazām atklājas tumšs noslēpums, ko tik cītīgi glabājuši viņa vecāki.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. St.Pauli - RB Leipzig
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Hapoel TA - FC Bayern
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Cīņu sports: One Championship. ONE Friday Fights
programme.desc: ONE Championship is a mixed martial arts (MMA) organization that showcases world-class fighters from across the globe. With a focus on martial arts values and a commitment to integrity, the league promotes adrenaline-pumping, action-packed fights that entertain and inspire fans worldwide. ONE Championship not only showcases the skills of elite fighters, but also highlights the cultural aspects of martial arts, making it a unique and captivating sporting experience.

programme.title: LaLiga. Osasuna - Villarreal
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Ekstrēmais sports: FIS PK. Val di Fassa (ITA) Ski Cross
UFC Žurnāls. Laika atskaite: Alexander Volkanovski-Diego Lopes
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Olympiacos - FC Barcelona
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Bundesliga. Augsburg - St.Pauli
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

First Time Fixer
programme.desc: A young family leverages their designer skills to transform a neglected 1950s house in Waco, Texas into a funky, family-friendly show home.

programme.title: Flipping 101 with Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Getting into property flipping can be daunting for first-timers, which is why Tarek El Moussa is on hand to share invaluable advice that will put them on course for handsome profits. With years in the industry, Tarek has seen and done it all. Now he wants to draw on some of his own experiences to ensure novice flippers dont make costly mistakes. Aided by Tareks knowledge and a few of his clients, surely nothing can go wrong? Reality series.

programme.title: Castle Impossible
programme.desc: After creating their renovated bedroom in the Bell Tower, Daphne and Ian transform a water-damaged room into a bathing chamber worthy of royalty.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: After a year-long wait, Kamohai and Tristyn face a never-ending nightmare after squatters take over a property in Waipahu, causing chaos and delays.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek is a self-proclaimed real estate genius with determination and drive. Christina is Tareks picture-perfect wife, who Tareks friends still cant believe he landed. In each episode of "Flip or Flop", Tarek and Christina flip a new property. From the nail-biting purchase at auction, to the frustrating renovations and maddening showings, to the giddy acceptance of an offer, well follow along as these two relatively novice flippers try their hand at the toughest game in town. From purchase to resale, weaving their personal lives within the story of the flip. From paying cash, sight unseen, for a property at auction, through the hapless remodeling process, to the frantic sale, this young couple is putting everything they have into this venture.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: College sweethearts who have always dreamed of having a home on the beach are in love with Topsail Island, NC. They hope to find a large, move-in ready house that offers plenty of space for family gatherings with their adult sons.

programme.title: Island Life

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Unspouse My House
programme.desc: Forgetting your ex isnt so easy when your whole house reminds you of them. Everywhere you turn, theres that horrible wall paper they insisted on getting, pictures of your holidays together, they even painted your front door their favourite colour. Thats where designer Orlando Soria comes in. Orlando considers himself somewhat a break-up expert, and hes determined to give these newly single clients houses the new lease of life that they so desperately need, allowing them to move on from their ex.

programme.desc: Daphne and Ian plan to build on her grandfathers wedding business. They create an impressive office and a cosy sitting room to host their clients.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: Join the family renovating a vacation home in Italys countryside over winter, following Chase, Sarah, their four kids, and dog across six episodes chronicling the projects progress from start to completion.

programme.title: House Hunters: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: After recovering from a serious illness, a couple looks for an oceanfront home on Oak Island, North Carolina.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: A New York City native is ready to buy a home in the LGBTQ+ positive community on Fire Island, New York.

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse
programme.desc: Boston-based home renovation experts and husband-wife team Mike and Denese Butler fix what they refer to as "Frankenstein" houses. These are older homes that have become filled with wonky layouts, misplaced staircases and maze-like hallways as different owners make changes over the years. Mike employs his construction know-how to create a functional flow, while Denese will capture the clients style with custom finishes. By blending elements of the older homes charm with modern design, the couple will produce stunning and cohesive spaces. Throughtout the episodes, Mike and Denese will overcome choppy rooms and wasted square footage for clients and work with their dads -- master carpenters John Butler and Peter Doyle -- to deliver one-of-a-kind projects for each family.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Bahamas Life
programme.desc: The idyllic Bahamas are the perfect getaway for travellers and vacationers alike, but for some, once you visit the paradisaical islands, its hard to forget their beauty. These enamored individuals drop their city lives for these stunning Caribbean shores, leaving their livelihoods, stresses and struggles behind. In each episode of Bahamas Life, we detail the processes involved, the choice of islands and the remarkable real estate opportunities for prospective buyers looking to fulfill their dreams.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt

Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek is a self-proclaimed real estate genius with determination and drive. Christina is Tareks picture-perfect wife, who Tareks friends still cant believe he landed. In each episode of "Flip or Flop", Tarek and Christina flip a new property. From the nail-biting purchase at auction, to the frustrating renovations and maddening showings, to the giddy acceptance of an offer, well follow along as these two relatively novice flippers try their hand at the toughest game in town. From purchase to resale, weaving their personal lives within the story of the flip. From paying cash, sight unseen, for a property at auction, through the hapless remodeling process, to the frantic sale, this young couple is putting everything they have into this venture.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: Most people only fantasize about living on an island, but well prove that an Island Life is possible for anyone. Tropical dreamers will be shown island properties that fit into any budget, from ultra-affordable to totally outrageous. Well follow everyday families is search of their own slice of paradise, and prove that fantasy can be reality.

programme.title: House Hunters: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: A couple searches for a waterfront house for their three teens in Florida. She wants great views, but hes more focused on the homes interior.

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: Home renovation expert Jennifer Todryk combines clever design and cost-saving ideas to create stunning home overhauls without any major demolition.

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: Jenn revamps a familys dated home to create more functional storage space in their craft room. Later, she designs a flex space in a family dining room.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: Design Down Under
programme.desc: Husband and wife design build team, Richie Morris and Georgia Ezra, create one-of-a-kind, modern designs and bespoke spaces for their clients in Melbourne, Australia while juggling their thriving businesses and family of four.

programme.desc: Marcus Lemonis assists a couple living in his former bachelor pad thats in need of serious upgrades. He transforms the interior and exterior to create a forever home.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Worm In The Sky, Thessaloniki Sounds. What is the odd, worm-like object seen in the sky in a video Tweeted by a Proof viewer? Did an ROV find the remains of a massive skeleton 2700 ft below the surface of the Mediterranean?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMs and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. "Pawn Stars" takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family — grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey — jointly run the family business, and theres clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: The teams access to UFO evidence is unparalleled and their expertise allows them to quickly identify bogus claims of UFOs. Together, they use eyewitness accounts, scientific experimentation, documents recently released through the Freedom of Information Act and footage that has never been seen before on television to piece together compelling — and at times chilling — evidence of UFO phenomena. Join UFO Hunters Bill Birnes, Pat Uskert, Dr. Ted Acworth, and Jeff Tomlinson as they separate fact from fallacy.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: There have been stories for centuries about huge, aggressive albino sperm whales. They were immortalised by the novel "Moby Dick." These stories told of whales targeting ships and ramming them with their huge heads. Could stories like this be true?

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: Treasure hunters Rick and Marty Lagina, the stars of Historys "The Curse of Oak Island," learn of a new mystery that may even rival Oak Islands. Michigan native Kevin Dykstra is obsessed with a deathbed confession made by a lighthouse keeper in the 1890s about a national treasure dating back to the Civil War. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. The stolen loot was smuggled north some years later but ended up in Lake Michigan, where Dykstra believes it still remains. His quest to prove it ultimately takes him and his team to the bottom of Lake Michigan.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: The teams access to UFO evidence is unparalleled and their expertise allows them to quickly identify bogus claims of UFOs. Together, they use eyewitness accounts, scientific experimentation, documents recently released through the Freedom of Information Act and footage that has never been seen before on television to piece together compelling — and at times chilling — evidence of UFO phenomena. Join UFO Hunters Bill Birnes, Pat Uskert, Dr. Ted Acworth, and Jeff Tomlinson as they separate fact from fallacy.

programme.title: Lost Worlds

From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside Americas UFO Investigation
programme.desc: In December of 2017, The New York Times published a stunning front-page expose about the Pentagons mysterious UFO program, the Advanced Aerospace Threat Identification Program (AATIP). Featuring an interview with a former military intelligence official and Special Agent In-Charge, Luis Elizondo, who confirmed the existence of the hidden government program, the controversial story was the focus of worldwide attention. Previously run by Elizondo, AATIP was created to research and investigate Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAP) including numerous videos of reported encounters, three of which were released to a shocked public in 2017. Elizondo resigned after expressing to the government that these UAPs could pose a major threat to our national security and not enough was being done to deal with them or address our potential vulnerabilities. Now, as a part of HISTORYs groundbreaking new six-part, one-hour limited series UNIDENTIFIED: INSIDE AMERICAS UFO INVESTIGATION, Elizondo is speaking out for the first time with Tom DeLonge, co-founder and President of To The Stars Academy of Arts and Science and Chris Mellon, former Deputy Assistant Secretary of Defense and Intelligence, to expose a series of startling encounters and embark on fascinating new investigations that will urge the public to ask questions and look for answers. The series will reveal newly authenticated evidence and footage, interviews from eyewitnesses and former military personnel who have never spoken out before, and extensive breakthroughs in understanding the technology behind these unknown phenomena in our skies.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: The Abominable Snowman is among the most frightening monsters in history. The MonsterQuest team will undertake their most dangerous expedition to date with an epic ascent onto the snowy peaks where recent evidence of the beast was found.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: How the Earth Was Made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Ross Kemp: Deep Sea Treasure Hunter
programme.desc: In a brand-new Sky HISTORY show, Ross Kemp dives on a series of incredible shipwrecks around the British coastline to reveal some of the nations murkiest and best-kept secrets. From the remains of a slave ship discovered off Plymouth, to the Kaisers sunken Imperial Fleet in Scapa Flow and an experimental submarine aircraft carrier, which sank with all passengers and crew on deck during its sea trials, Ross uncovers Britains hidden maritime past.

programme.title: The Tesla Files
programme.desc: Why were trunks belonging to genius inventor Nikola Tesla confiscated in 1943? Did they contain the plans for nearly free worldwide electricity, massive death rays, and other inventions out of the future? A new investigation driven by declassified CIA documents suggests a secret history of bitter rivalries, government conspiracies, Cold War and WW2 spycraft, extra-terrestrial communication, and amazing achievements of a truly gifted man – Nikola Tesla.

programme.title: Engineering Disasters
programme.desc: Engineering has built our modern world. Everything from skyscrapers to roads and air travel exist because of advances in engineering. What happens when engineering goes horribly wrong? Engineering Disasters goes beyond the headlines to uncover what really happened in the most notorious engineering accidents. What caused an outdoor stage to collapse in Indiana, killing seven? How did a collection of classic Corvettes disappear right out of thin air? Why did a planes fuselage rip open in mid-flight? What was behind the collapse of a domed stadium? Each hour long episode combines expert and eyewitness interviews, state of the art graphics and dramatic moment of disaster footage to tell the story behind the worlds most terrifying engineering disasters.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: An FBI cold case that has laid dormant for 70 years leads a group of world-renown investigators on the ultimate manhunt to finally answer the question: Did Adolf Hitler survive World War II? In early 2014 the FBI declassified hundreds of confidential documents showing that Hitler may have not committed suicide but rather escaped to South America after the fall of Germany. A memo from J. Edgar Hoover himself states "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Armed with the most cutting edge technology and these newly released FBI files the team will approach this case like a modern death claims investigation. Whether they are investigating a mysterious Nazi lair deep in the Argentinian jungle or diving for evidence of a missing U-Boat that could of shuttled Hitler to South America our team will focus on the tried and tested tenants for solving a fraudulent death case: follow the money where was the subject last seen, eyewitness reports, make contact with known associates and forensics.With declassified worldwide intelligence providing a wealth of new clues and modern technology never before available we reopen this world famous cold case in hopes of solving the mystery surrounding the demise of one of the biggest criminals of all time.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: What if the history you knew was only half the story? Brad Meltzers Decoded investigates the other half: the secret history of the symbols and codes that surround us everyday. Best-selling author Brad Meltzer has been writing novels for more than a decade. He has studied and written about some of the most revered institutions and documents in human history, including the U.S. Supreme Court, the Presidency, the Secret Service, Wall Street and the Bible. Brad has assembled a team to investigate the countless clues and theories uncovered through his years of research, but unexplored until now. From the dollar bill to the first Presidential Codes, the hidden messages of the Statue of Liberty and the ciphers protecting the location of lost Confederate gold, the team uncovers the truth behind historys most provocative secrets.

programme.title: Evolve
programme.desc: Documentary series. Evolve takes an in-depth look at the evolution of some of the planets most iconic animals. Using computer generated imagery and experimental science, the team take you on a journey through history to look at how these species evolved to fit their habitats and surroundings. The show explores the diverse and unique anatomy changes our planets historic species have gone through. Whether its the deadly teeth of Tyrannosaurus Rex, the telescopic eyesight of lightning-fast birds, or the night vision big cats use to hunt, Evolve reveals some of natures most interesting secrets. Nominated in 2009s News and Documentary Emmy Award for Outstanding Science And Technology Programming.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Former Green Berry Terry Schappert explores the stories of some of the most iconic warrior groups in history, including their weaponry, training, fighting tactics and more. The veteran investigates what made these legendary fighters great, but also what were their weaknesses. Join him as he looks into the battling masteries of the Vikings, the Samurai, the Spartans and more.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: The teams access to UFO evidence is unparalleled and their expertise allows them to quickly identify bogus claims of UFOs. Together, they use eyewitness accounts, scientific experimentation, documents recently released through the Freedom of Information Act and footage that has never been seen before on television to piece together compelling — and at times chilling — evidence of UFO phenomena. Join UFO Hunters Bill Birnes, Pat Uskert, Dr. Ted Acworth, and Jeff Tomlinson as they separate fact from fallacy.

programme.title: Engineering Disasters
programme.desc: Engineering has built our modern world. Everything from skyscrapers to roads and air travel exist because of advances in engineering. What happens when engineering goes horribly wrong? Engineering Disasters goes beyond the headlines to uncover what really happened in the most notorious engineering accidents. What caused an outdoor stage to collapse in Indiana, killing seven? How did a collection of classic Corvettes disappear right out of thin air? Why did a planes fuselage rip open in mid-flight? What was behind the collapse of a domed stadium? Each hour long episode combines expert and eyewitness interviews, state of the art graphics and dramatic moment of disaster footage to tell the story behind the worlds most terrifying engineering disasters.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: An FBI cold case that has laid dormant for 70 years leads a group of world-renown investigators on the ultimate manhunt to finally answer the question: Did Adolf Hitler survive World War II? In early 2014 the FBI declassified hundreds of confidential documents showing that Hitler may have not committed suicide but rather escaped to South America after the fall of Germany. A memo from J. Edgar Hoover himself states "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Armed with the most cutting edge technology and these newly released FBI files the team will approach this case like a modern death claims investigation. Whether they are investigating a mysterious Nazi lair deep in the Argentinian jungle or diving for evidence of a missing U-Boat that could of shuttled Hitler to South America our team will focus on the tried and tested tenants for solving a fraudulent death case: follow the money where was the subject last seen, eyewitness reports, make contact with known associates and forensics.With declassified worldwide intelligence providing a wealth of new clues and modern technology never before available we reopen this world famous cold case in hopes of solving the mystery surrounding the demise of one of the biggest criminals of all time.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: What if the history you knew was only half the story? Brad Meltzers Decoded investigates the other half: the secret history of the symbols and codes that surround us everyday. Best-selling author Brad Meltzer has been writing novels for more than a decade. He has studied and written about some of the most revered institutions and documents in human history, including the U.S. Supreme Court, the Presidency, the Secret Service, Wall Street and the Bible. Brad has assembled a team to investigate the countless clues and theories uncovered through his years of research, but unexplored until now. From the dollar bill to the first Presidential Codes, the hidden messages of the Statue of Liberty and the ciphers protecting the location of lost Confederate gold, the team uncovers the truth behind historys most provocative secrets.

programme.title: Evolve
programme.desc: Documentary series. Evolve takes an in-depth look at the evolution of some of the planets most iconic animals. Using computer generated imagery and experimental science, the team take you on a journey through history to look at how these species evolved to fit their habitats and surroundings. The show explores the diverse and unique anatomy changes our planets historic species have gone through. Whether its the deadly teeth of Tyrannosaurus Rex, the telescopic eyesight of lightning-fast birds, or the night vision big cats use to hunt, Evolve reveals some of natures most interesting secrets. Nominated in 2009s News and Documentary Emmy Award for Outstanding Science And Technology Programming.

programme.desc: Documentary series presented by the journalist Paula Zahn. Speaking to people connected with real-life crimes and looking at actions surrounding these shocking events, Zahn aims to uncover the truth behind true crime cases.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: Investigation Discovery and People magazine partner to re-examine some of the most high profile crime cases in recent history. The one-hour series brings viewers tales of betrayal, buried secrets and unsung heroes, ripped from the pages of one of the nations top weekly magazines. These stories transcended news and became part of pop culture, revealing shocking twists, new evidence, and unexpected resolutions. Interlaced within every episode are exclusive interviews with Peoples journalists, archival footage, re-creations, and firsthand accounts by those closest to the investigations.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: Crime documentary series that examines homicide investigations using unfiltered footage, including body-cam, surveillance and interrogation-room footage, giving viewers a chance to follow a case from beginning to end. The series will give viewers a chance to experience how homicide cases are conducted, from the initial crime scene investigations by body cam, to home security tapes, to interrogation room footage of real confessions. Real tapes of the investigations will be combined with interviews with friends, family members, and law enforcement directly involved in the case.

programme.title: Body Cam: EMT
programme.desc: Paramedics race to save a 17-year-old from a gunshot wound. Plus, when a man stops breathing, paramedics on the scene quickly become suspicious of his wife.

programme.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn
programme.desc: Documentary series presented by the journalist Paula Zahn. Speaking to people connected with real-life crimes and looking at actions surrounding these shocking events, Zahn aims to uncover the truth behind true crime cases.

programme.title: Murder By Numbers
programme.desc: Murder by Numbers is a true-crime documentary series exploring disturbing cases of deranged killers across the USA. Using extensive reenactments, the brutal crimes are brought to life, to show viewers the appearance of crime scenes and the issues faced by detectives. After bodies are found, vigorous investigations begin, with law enforcement officials scrambling to unearth evidence and identify the culprit. What they find leaves more than a sour taste, as distressing discoveries of a second corpse leaves officials stunned and disturbed. Now the investigation takes a far more sinister and eerie turn.

programme.title: Homicide City
programme.desc: In this true-crime documentary series we profile the unforgettable murders committed on the streets of Philadelphia. Home to 1.5 million people, Pennsylvanias largest city has one of the highest murder rates in the United States. We speak with a variety of people who remember these cases, from veteran homicide detectives to local reporters, and listen to the excruciating stories from victims families, who forever bear the burden of a murdered loved one. In unprecedented detail, we reveal the motives and culprits behind these tragic killings. These are the cases that shook a city, leaving a lasting imprint on all those involved.

programme.title: Breaking Homicide
programme.desc: The most tragic crimes are the ones that never reached a conclusion, lives have been lost and no one ever held accountable as the case eventually goes cold. What happens when years pass by with no justice? Police Detective Derrick Levasseur and Forensic Psychologist Kris Mohandiewill are on a mission to reopen cases and find answers for the victims and loved ones who need to finally feel peace. Theyll be looking into cases such as Michelle OKeefe and Devan Schmidt murders, re-examining old clues and sourcing new ones, will they be able to find details that have previously been missed?

programme.title: Hometown Homicide
programme.desc: Hometown Homicide is a documentary crime series dedicated to investigations of cold blooded murders in small towns and communities. The investigators are looking for the killer in a place where everybody knows everybody but keeps silent. This series makes us realize that small communities can hide dark secrets and the killer can live just next door. Sometimes its hard to believe that the stories are based on facts.

Charismatic and intelligent, he used his street smarts to work the neighborhoods, gather critical information and solve over 800 cases, putting himself in dangerous situations on a daily basis. Detective McFadden often knew those involved- the victims, the family members and sometimes even the culprits. The series features his incredible stories, dramatic reenactments and present-day interviews with family members of victims.

programme.desc: Chilling true-crime documentary series that explores the relationships that ended with fatal result. Series features archive footage, dramatic reconstructions and interviews with family, friends and law enforcement. From a suspicious carbon monoxide incident, a parrot who became an eyewitness to murder, to a spouse with a spiraling gambling addiction, and a motorcycle accident that is not what it seems, each episode will uncover the breaking point in each of these complex and toxic relationships and tell a tragic tale of what happens when love becomes lethal.

programme.title: Before They Kill Again
programme.desc: A copycat Zodiac killer terrorises New York City while keeping cops guessing his identity. It falls to veteran NYPD detectives to outwit him.

programme.title: Before They Kill Again
programme.desc: No one knows how many victims a serial killer targeting hunters has killed. With the next hunting season looming, they must find the madman.

programme.title: The Dead Files
programme.desc: On "The Dead Files," Cindy Kaza, an evidential medium, and Steve DiSchiavi, a retired NYPD homicide detective, join forces to investigate paranormal activity in haunted locations across the United States. Their unique talents combine to create a powerful team that aims to unravel the mysteries of the supernatural world. With a blend of psychic intuition and investigative skills, Kaza and DiSchiavi explored the boundaries between the living and the dead, seeking answers to unexplained phenomena that defy conventional explanations. Their captivating narratives offer viewers a glimpse into the uncharted territories of the afterlife, bridging the gap between this world and the next.

programme.title: Ghost Nation
programme.desc: Jason, Steve, Dave and Shari head to Pennsylvania to investigate Harrisburg State Hospital, a former asylum plagued by paranormal activity. With the impending demolition of several buildings on the sprawling campus, the surrounding community lives in fear of where the disturbed spirits will go. In their largest investigation to date, the team uncovers gruesome deaths and captures solid evidence that the ghosts of the asylum are indeed restless.

programme.title: Ghost Nation
programme.desc: Jason, Steve, Dave and Shari continue their extended investigation of Harrisburg State Hospital. Joined by Jasons daughters, Sam and Satori, the team uses their unique approach and high-tech gear to peel away the layers of the haunted propertys past. They suspect the former asylums dark and disturbing history might be the root of the intense paranormal activity that could soon threaten the surrounding community when the buildings are demolished.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: One of the most successful paranormal series of all time is back? And, its bigger and better than ever. Original cast member Grant Wilson returns with an all-star, handpicked team to help people struggling with unexplained supernatural phenomena. New proprietary ghost-hunting technology will allow viewers to actually see a ghost for the first time on television.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: One of the most successful paranormal series of all time is back? And, its bigger and better than ever. Original cast member Grant Wilson returns with an all-star, handpicked team to help people struggling with unexplained supernatural phenomena. programme.title: Murder In the Heartland
programme.desc: This series focuses on the dark underbelly of the American mid-west, its heartland. Each episode deals with a specific murder thats been commited in one of the small towns that make up this iconic region of the US with the locals enhancing the tales and bringing clues to our attention. The show includes interviews with the victims family, friends, law enforcement officers and also provides dramatic reenactments to bring the stories to life. Episodes reveal true stories such as when an Oklahoma familys dog drops a human skull onto their porch and the police are called in to investigate; a bride-to-be who discovers her betrothed shot in the head in their living room; a beloved father, son and fiancee who is discovered beaten to death in his own driveway; and a devoted family man who diappears after his truck is set on fire.

programme.title: Лицом к событию
programme.desc: Лидер в той или иной сфере общественной жизни - человек известный и информированный - под перекрестным огнем вопросов ведущих программы Михаила Соколова и Елены Рыковцевой.

programme.title: Мамаша
programme.desc: Рассказ о жизни Кристи Планкетт, одинокой матери, которая преодолела свою зависимость от алкоголя и наркотиков и пытается начать жизнь заново в городе Напа, Калифорния, который является центром американского виноделия. Она работает официанткой в ресторане и посещает встречи анонимных алкоголиков. Её мать Бонни Планкетт, также как и дочь, справилась с зависимостью от алкоголя и наркотиков и хочет наладить отношения с дочерью. Семнадцатилетняя дочь Вайолет, родившаяся, когда Кристи было всего 16 лет, ждет ребёнка от своего приятеля Люка. У Кристи также есть второй ребёнок - Роско, от бывшего парня по имени Бакстер. У Бакстера нет работы, он не платит алименты Кристи, а его планы о заработке денег связаны с продажей наркотиков.

programme.title: Мамаша
programme.desc: Рассказ о жизни Кристи Планкетт, одинокой матери, которая преодолела свою зависимость от алкоголя и наркотиков и пытается начать жизнь заново в городе Напа, Калифорния, который является центром американского виноделия. programme.title: Первые ласточки. Зависимые
programme.desc: Леша пойдет на собеседование в редакцию, где работал Иван. Кира поручит ему узнать, сколько зарабатывал покойный Кожух. Откуда у мальчика-сироты неожиданно взялись деньги на брендовые вещи? Узнай прямо сейчас! Кира разозлится на Альбину и Влада за то, что они не послушали ее советов и отправились на встречу с человеком, не узнав, кто он такой. Кира запретит им заниматься расследованием дальше, однако парочку это не остановит. Альбина и Влад поедут в пансионат к бабушке Кожуха. Соседка старушки отведет Альбину в сторонку, чтобы рассказать ей какой-то секрет о Ване… Будет ли ее информация полезной?

programme.title: Ловушка
programme.desc: Главе самого мощного городского мафиозного клана удалось прекратить криминальные войны. Казалось бы, он наконец-то может уйти на покой, передав дела своим молодым и дерзким помощникам. Но те слишком рьяно берутся за дело: быстро удваивают доходы, но своими жесткими методами вызывают волну всеобщего недовольства. Мечта крестного отца о тихой жизни никак не осуществится - ему постоянно приходится вмешиваться, чтобы сохранить мир. Однако о мире приходится забыть, когда после 12-ти лет тюрьмы в город возвращается крупный криминальный авторитет, готовый любой ценой вернуть утраченные позиции.

programme.title: Утро
programme.desc: Утренняя новостная программа Настоящего времени.

programme.title: Ждём в гости
programme.desc: Проект Ирины Хангошвили о культуре, истории и традициях различных стран мира. Ведущий - Зураб Двали - путешествует и приглашает зрителей пройтись вместе с ним по красивым местам, увидеть достопримечательности, полюбоваться природой и познакомиться с интересными людьми. Всюду гостеприимные хозяева говорят нашим телезрителям: "Ждем в гости!" Зрители сначала узнают интересные исторические факты о самых известных или забытых регионах различных стран, и затем останавливаются на кулинарных традициях - готовят несколько блюд с гостями программы.

programme.title: Все любят Рэймонда
programme.desc: "Все любят Рэймонда" – это американская ситком-комедия, повествующая о повседневной жизни Рэймонда Барона, спортивного обозревателя, проживающего с семьёй на Лонг-Айленде. Основная изюминка сериала – остроумный характер комедии, где на первый план выходят семейные отношения: с любящей, но часто критичной женой, Деброй, детьми, а также с навязчивыми родителями и завистливым братом, которые живут через дорогу. Сериал идеально подойдёт для тех, кто хочет смотреть лёгкие и забавные истории о семейной жизни. Серию за серией, комедийные ситуации создают атмосферу доброты и юмора.

programme.title: Все любят Рэймонда
programme.desc: "Все любят Рэймонда" – это американская ситком-комедия, повествующая о повседневной жизни Рэймонда Барона, спортивного обозревателя, проживающего с семьёй на Лонг-Айленде. programme.title: На своем месте
programme.desc: Инга, Даша и Лариса дружат уже много лет. Инга — домохозяйка и мать троих детей. Даша работала стюардессой, но после развода с мужем уволилась и подрабатывает репетитором английского. Лариса — следователь, и сейчас она после долгого перерыва наконец возвращается на любимую работу. Муж Инги Артём, владелец небольшой фирмы, занимающейся грузоперевозками, заключает "выгодный" контракт на перевозку некоего груза. Он не знает, что его друг и бизнес-партнёр Рубен за его спиной договорился с заказчиком — криминальным авторитетом — угнать грузовик фирмы вместе с грузом. А вскоре Инга попадает в ловушку: в багажнике своей машины она обнаруживает труп. Героиня решает провести собственное расследование и привлекает к этому делу подруг.

programme.title: Острое блюдо
programme.desc: Ирина Рублёва собирается отпраздновать свой день рождения в турецком отеле, куда ее семью пригласили друзья — супруги Люда и Борис. Но праздник оказывается испорчен: Ирина узнает, что ее муж Вадим не сможет приехать из-за важных дел… На курорте Ирина знакомится с романтичным турком Керемом, который влюбляется в нее и обещает ждать всю жизнь. Для героини это шанс вырваться из невыносимого брака, где свекровь тиранит ее, а муж — бьет. Но решится ли она на такой отчаянный шаг?
